title: Zeldin Campaign Investigated Over Charge of Coordinating With Super PACs
description: A State Board of Elections investigation was stalled when two Republican board members were absent from a vote to request subpoena power.
dc:creator: Nicholas Fandos and Dana Rubinstein
media:credit: Hilary Swift for The New York Times
